title: A Godfather of Chinese Nationalism Has Second Thoughts
description: Wang Xiaodong, once called the standard-bearer of Chinese nationalism, now fends off criticisms of being too moderate, even a traitor. “They’ve forgotten,” he said, “I created them.”
dc:creator: Vivian Wang
media:credit: Gilles Sabrié for The New York Times
media:description: Wang Xiaodong in a Beijing bookstore in September.
